BindingAutoRun: Press this key to toggle auto-run mode, which will allow you to move without holding down a mouse button. You can cancel auto-run by pressing this key again or pressing any mouse button.
BindingConsole: Slides the console window down from the top of the screen, and lets the player issue game commands.
BindingMessageLog: Displays a translucent overlay window with a history of the player's chat messages and console commands.
BindingQuests: Opens the Quests and Journals menu.
BindingSimpleChat: Opens a one-line box for typing chat messages or console commands.
BindingToggleEnemyPlayerHPBars: Toggles enemy players' health bars on and off.
BindingToggleFriendlyPlayerHPBars: Toggles friendly players' health bars on and off.
BindingToggleInjuredMonsterHPBars: Toggles damaged monsters' health bars on and off.
BindingToggleItemsOnGround: Toggles the display of item names on the ground.
BindingToggleRunWalk: Press this key to change the default movement from walking to running.
ClanInformation_Disabled: The Clan Leader or Officers must fill out the Clan Information input in the Clan Settings for this to be interactable
ConnectionLost: Unable to perform that action while attempting to reconnect.
CosmeticItemDescription: Use this item to unlock a new look in the Wardrobe.
CosmeticItemDescription_Mount: Use this item to add a new cosmetic look for your Mount. Manage Mount cosmetics at the Stablemaster.
CracklingEnergyTooltip: Crackling Energy periodically damages nearby enemies when picked up.
DOT_Damage_Shadow: Affected By Shadow Damage Over Time
DropIn_AccountPartitionFailure: Hardcore characters can only play with hardcore characters, and seasonal characters can only play with seasonal characters.
DropIn_PrologueFailure: A character that has not completed the Prologue cannot join a party that is past the Prologue.
DropIn_WorldTierFailure: This character is not eligible for the party's World Tier.
DruidSpirit_BodyText: Increase your reputation by offering items to the spirit.
EmptySkillHotbarSlot: {icon:rmb} to assign Skills to this button.
HealthPotion: Heals for {c_resource}{s1}{/c} Life instantly and {c_resource}{s2}{/c} Maximum Life over {c_number}{s3}{/c} seconds.
HirelingCantHire: You cannot use Followers when you are playing with another player.
ItemDungeonAffixDescription: Transform this dungeon into a Nightmare Dungeon
ItemPvPEarDescription: An ear of {s1}, a Level {s2} {s3}, killed in {s4}
LifeDescription:
{c_gold}Life:{/c} {c_resource}{s1}{/c}
Lose it all, and you're dead.
LockedMountTransmogTooltip: Purchase from the Stable Master or from the Shop
LockedTransmogTooltip: Salvage items or visit the Shop to discover new looks
MountArmorUnlockInstruction: Learn this item and unlock a new item at the Stable Master
NewGameHardcoreMode: Hardcore characters are destroyed when they die. Yes, even if it wasn't your fault! Please use with caution.
OptionAutoequipItems: Automatically equip items when they are picked up.
OptionInventoryZoom: Zoom in when the Inventory menu is open.
OptionsCriticals: Display floating numbers above monsters that show Critical Strike Damage dealt by the player.
OptionsDefensiveMessages: Display floating numbers above monsters that show Blocks, Parries, and Dodges.
OptionsFloatingNumbers: Display floating numbers above monsters that show normal damage dealt by the player.
OptionsFriendlyHealthBars: Display names and health bars over friendly players.
OptionsLockSkillbar: Prevents the user from picking up or dragging Skills onto the action bar. Hold down the SHIFT key to move Skills when the action bar is locked.
OptionsShowBreadCrumbs: Show Quest Objectives on the Mini-map
OptionsShowEnemyPlayerHPBars: Display health bars for damaged enemy players.
OptionsShowItemTooltipsOnDrop: Briefly display item tooltips when the item drops on the ground.
OptionsShowMonsterHPBars: Display health bars for damaged monsters.
OptionsSoundEAX: Use Environmental Audio Extensions for more realistic sounds.
OptionsSoundReverseSpeakers: Swap the output of your left and right speakers.
OptionsVideoDepthOfField: Enable depth of field. (Only recommended for high-end systems.)
OptionsVideoFSAA: Fullscreen Anti-Aliasing can smooth the image and eliminate jagged edges.
OptionsVideoPhysics:
Determines the realism of colliding objects and gravity.

Physics relies on your computer's processor (CPU).
OptionsVideoReflections: Higher quality reflections may require a more powerful system.
OptionsVideoResolution: Higher resolution will result in increased clarity, but this greatly affects performance. Choose a resolution that matches the aspect ratio of your monitor.
OptionsVideoTextures: Determines the clarity and size of textures used throughout the game. Higher texture quality will result in more detail, but it requires more video memory.
OptionsVideoTripleBuffer: Triple buffering can improve the smoothness of your frame rate.
OptionsVideoVSync: Synchronizes your frame rate to some fraction of your monitor's refresh rate. This will reduce tearing of the image.
OptionsVideoWindowMode: Allows you to change the primary display mode of the game to Fullscreen, Windowed, or Windowed (Fullscreen). Windowed modes may cause a drop in performance.
PlayerLevel:
{c_label}Player Level{/c} 
Click to open the Character screen.
PotionUpgradeAvailable: {c_warning}Upgrade available at the{icon:Marker_Crafter_Alchemist, 2}Alchemist (Text logic not hooked up yet){/c}
ResourceDesc_ComboPoints:
{c_gold}Combo Points:{/c} {c_resource}{s1}{/c}
Your {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills now generate Combo Points. {c_important}Core{/c} Skills consume Combo Points for additional effects.
ResourceDesc_DruidCharges:
{c_gold}Primal Wrath:{/c} {c_resource}{s1}{/c}
Generated when the Druid uses Mana spending Skills. Used for more powerful Druid attacks.
ResourceDesc_Energy:
{c_gold}Energy:{/c} {c_resource}{s1}{/c}
Used to perform more powerful attacks. Energy quickly regenerates over time.
ResourceDesc_Essence:
{c_gold}Essence:{/c} {c_resource}{s1}{/c}
Generated when using certain Skills and over time. Used for attacks and Curses.
ResourceDesc_Fury:
{c_gold}Fury:{/c} {c_resource}{s1}{/c}
Generated when using certain Skills or taking damage. Used for powerful attacks.
ResourceDesc_Mana:
{c_gold}Mana:{/c} {c_resource}{s1}{/c}
Used to cast most Skills. Mana automatically regenerates over time.
ResourceDesc_Spirit:
{c_gold}Spirit:{/c} {c_resource}{s1}{/c}
Generated by using certain Skills.  Used for more powerful Druid attacks.
RestorationPotion: Heals ({HEAL_AMOUNT} / 60) Life per second for {HEAL_DURATION} minutes.
RuneUnsocketedCondition: {s1}, activate the next socketed Rune at {c_gold}[RuneConditionScalar()*100]%{/c} strength.
SkillPointNotify: A new Skill slot is available.
Socketable: Can be inserted into equipment with sockets.
StashExpansion: Your Stash has increased in size!
TipEvade:
{c_gold}Evade{/c_gold}
Use to move quickly out of danger.
TipInnerSight:
{c_label}Inner Sight{/c}
Attack marked enemies to fill up the gauge. When it's full, gain unlimited Energy for a duration.
TipTownPortalLocked:
{c_gold}Town Portal{/c_gold}
Unable to use, the party leader must first unlocked it.
TipWalkingArsenal:
{c_label}Walking Arsenal{/c}
Damage increased by using each Arsenal weapon
TrainingTreeLevelProgressWarning: {c_red}Complete Other Conditions in this Tree to Unlock{/c}
TransmogAlreadyUnlocked: {icon:Character_Transmog_Item_Icon_Grey, 2.0} This look is available at the Wardrobe
TransmogToggleDisabled: Equip an item to enable transmog
UnidentifiedDetails: {c_red}This item cannot be equipped until it is identified.{/c}
UseAtCrafter: Learn this item and unlock a new Recipe that can be crafted at the {s1}.
Warning_Stronghold: {icon:Marker_NotSynced_Big, 2.5} {c_red}Party must conquer this Stronghold to progress.{/c}
Wheel_ActionBar_Instructions: Use the hotkey to access a wheel of customizable actions.
WorldTiers_Disabled: World Tiers are unlocked by completing the Campaign and Capstone Dungeon {icon:Marker_DungeonChallenge, 2.0} within the previous World Tier.
WorldTiers_Level: This World Tier has been unlocked, but it requires Level {s1} to enter.
WorldTiers_Party: A member of your party has not unlocked this World Tier. All party members must have unlocked the same World Tier to join it.
